stockd.defs.bar



struct Bar;
Defines BAR structure

DateTime time;
Time of BAR

double open;
Open price

double high;
Highest bar price

double low;
Lowest bar price

double close;
Close price

ulong volume;
Volume traded

this(DateTime time, double open, double high, double low, double close, ulong volume = 0);
Params:

double[] ohlc();
Returns just price values as OHLC array
